body:
PR: Milestone 1 — CI/Security Baseline

Summary
- Add non-disruptive CI/security workflows and repo hygiene per plan.md.
- Existing .github/workflows/ci.yml left unchanged.

Included
- Matrix CI: .github/workflows/ci-matrix.yml (fmt+clippy on ubuntu/macos/windows; cargo test on ubuntu only)
- Security: .github/workflows/security.yml (cargo-audit, cargo-deny, gitleaks with .gitleaks.toml, CycloneDX SBOM)
- CodeQL: .github/workflows/codeql.yml (Rust)
- Dependabot: .github/dependabot.yml
- Hygiene: .editorconfig, .pre-commit-config.yaml, deny.toml, .gitleaks.toml
- Docs: plan.md; CONTRIBUTING.md pre-commit/security note

Triage Checklist (run on this PR)
- [ ] cargo-audit: review advisories; update deps or document temporary ignore
- [ ] cargo-deny: address license/bans/sources; justify minimal allowlist changes
- [ ] gitleaks: confirm findings are false positives or rotate/remove secrets
- [ ] SBOM: artifact uploaded; link retained in PR summary
- [ ] CodeQL: review alerts; file issues or fix
- [ ] Pre-commit: pre-commit run -a clean locally; update CONTRIBUTING if tweaks needed

commits.messageBody: …rity scans, CodeQL, Dependabot, editorconfig, pre-commit, cargo-deny, gitleaks cfg); plan.md
commits.messageHeadline: Milestone 1: add non-disruptive CI/security scaffolding (matrix, secu…
chore: ignore .code and remove accidental agent artifacts
chore(security): fix cargo-deny toolchain, add GITHUB_TOKEN to gitlea…
chore(sbom): run via +stable with --workspace --all-features; fail up…

title: Milestone 1 — CI/Security Baseline
